title: Having a Jolie good time! Natalie Roser dresses up as mistress of evil Maleficent for Halloween
text:
They're one of the most genetically blessed couples on the planet.

And even in costume Natalie Roser, 29 and Harley Bonner, 28 are more cute than creepy, with the pair dressing up as iconic characters for Halloween on Monday.

Taking to Instagram, the model posted a photo of herself dressed as mistress of evil Maleficent - the evil witch character played by Angelina Jolie - while her beau dressed as Goku from anime classic Dragon Ball Z.

Having a Jolie good time! Natalie Roser (pictured) dressed up as Maleficent on Sunday

'Happy Halloween', she captioned the photo-set, while Harley, wrote, '28 year old 8 year old.'

In the photos, the normally blonde Natalie looked barely recognisable as Maleficent as she donned a dark brown wig and a wore a tight-fitting black dress.

The brunette accessorised with the wicked sorceress iconic horns and opted for a luminous makeup palette and the bold red lip synonymous with the legendary Disney villain.

Just Saiyan: Harley channeled his inner super fan, as he opted for the niche choice as Goku from cult-classic Japanese anime series Dragon Ball Z

Meanwhile, Harley channeled his inner anime super fan, as he opted for a more niche choice as Goku from cult-classic Japanese series Dragon Ball Z.

In the photos, Harley is seen posing in a perfectly sculptured aquamarine blue wig, as he wore Goku's signature orange karate Gi secured by a blue waistband.

During the series, the hunky actor reenacts Goku's signature signature hand motion the 'kamehameha'.

Loved up! The pair first announced their relationship in March 2017, have been going from strength-to-strength ever since

Natalie recently relocated to Los Angeles with her beau Harley, and has found success in the American swimwear modelling scene thanks to her incredible physique and down-to-earth nature.

The former Miss Universe has previously said that American swimwear designers like casting Australian models for their 'energy' and natural affinity for the beach lifestyle.

'I think a lot of the designers are looking for good energy so I like to think we bring that for them and I think designers here respond really well to a fit body shape which so many Australian girls have.' she said.
description: They're one of the most genetically blessed couples on the planet.
authors: Joe Scek For Daily Mail Australia
